item.title: What Is a Tcp Stream
item.description: The TCP protocol is modeled on the concept of a single continuous stream of unlimited length. This is a very important concept to understand, and is the number one cause of confusion that we see. What exactly does this mean, and how does it affect developers? Imagine that you’re trying to send a few messages over the socket. So you do something like this (in pseudocode): socket.write("Hi Sandy."); socket.write("Are you busy tonight?
